Uses of Interface
com.soa.policy.wspolicy.Assertion

  • Packages that use Assertion 
    Package Description
    com.soa.policy.wspolicy  

    • Uses of Assertion in com.soa.policy.wspolicy

      Subinterfaces of Assertion in com.soa.policy.wspolicy 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SubPolicyAssertion
      A type of assertion that supports sub-policy, meaning that the assertion might or must have nested policy.
      Classes in com.soa.policy.wspolicy that implement Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAssertion
      A base class for Assertions, providing the initial implementation of the Assertion interface.
      class  AbstractSubPolicyAssertion
      A base class for SubPolicyAssertions, providing the initial implementation of the SubPolicyAssertion interface.
      class  JavaAssertion<T>
      Assertion implementation that defers the assertion attribute modeling to a wrapped Java object.
      class  XmlAssertion
      An assertion whose contents remain in a DOM-based format.
      Methods in com.soa.policy.wspolicy that return Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Assertion JavaAssertion.cloneAssertion() 
      Assertion SubPolicyAssertion.cloneAssertion()
      Returns a cloned version of this assertion.
      Assertion XmlAssertion.cloneAssertion() 
      Assertion AssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
      Unmarshals the given element to a new assertion instance created by this class.
      Assertion ReflectionAssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element) 
      Assertion XmlAssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element) 
      Assertion AssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element, Policy subPolicy)
      Identical semantics as unmarshal(Element), except sub-policy was found as a child (or children, in the case of multiple policy) of the given element.
      Assertion ReflectionAssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element, Policy subPolicy) 
      Assertion XmlAssertionMarshaller.unmarshal(org.w3c.dom.Element element, Policy subPolicy) 
      Assertion PolicyMarshaller.unmarshalAssertion(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
      Returns an assertion object representing the assertion in the given element.
      Methods in com.soa.policy.wspolicy that return types with arguments of type Assertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Assertion> PolicyOperator.getAssertions()
      Returns all added assertions.
      java.util.List<Assertion> PolicyOperator.getAssertions(javax.xml.namespace.QName assertionName)
      Returns all added assertions with the given name.
